0110000101011101 0101010101101110 1 -> sum: 1011011011001100, cout: 0
0110001111011010 1100001110011111 1 -> sum: 0010011101111010, cout: 1

0101010011010011 0100101011000001 0 -> sum: 1001111110010100, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
